description: This file contains a stock model ranking engine implementing the BRD v1.2 logic. It computes predicted growth percentages for a universe of stocks, ranks them, appends a specific stock (INTC), and outputs structured results including a trade decision and sector warning.

methods.name: isoNow()
methods.description: Returns the current timestamp in ISO format.

methods.name: mean(nums)
methods.description: Calculates the arithmetic mean of an array of numbers.

methods.name: stdev(nums)
methods.description: Calculates the sample standard deviation of an array of numbers.

methods.name: canonicalResultRow({ rank, ticker, company_name, sector, current_price, predicted_price, predicted_1d_growth_pct, trailing, })
methods.description: Formats a stock prediction result into a consistent output row with fixed column order.

methods.name: ensureIntcRow(universe)
methods.description: Ensures the INTC stock data exists in universe; if missing, creates a mock row.

methods.name: computePredictionRow(u)
methods.description: Calculates predicted growth and price for a stock based on normalized factors.

methods.name: sectorWarningForTop10(top10)
methods.description: Analyzes top 10 stocks for sector concentration warning.

methods.name: tradeHeader(top10)
methods.description: Determines whether to trade based on top 10 growth predictions.

methods.name: runModel({ config, current_date, prediction_date })
methods.description: Main function that runs the stock ranking engine, fetches universe data, computes predictions, ranks, and outputs structured results along with a trade decision and warnings.

ctags.name: canonicalResultRow
ctags.signature: ({ rank, ticker, company_name, sector, current_price, predicted_price, predicted_1d_growth_pct, trailing, })

ctags.name: runModel
ctags.pattern: /^export async function runModel({ config, current_date, prediction_date }) {$/
